page.title: 15RURAL SCHOOL LIFE 1985
page.content: We start school at nine o'clock. In the morning we do English and Maths, but on Tuesday we go swimming at the Whitchurch swimming baths. At lunch time we have several different meals to choose from.After lunch we play outside on the climbing frames or we might play Cricket or Football. In the afternoon we do study work and sometimes we may have a story before school finishes. On Wednesday we do games until 4 o'clock.I think that school is alright.I have lots of friends.We have a school library,we are able to borrow books from it.In 1985 Adderley school won a 5 a side football cup .In 1984 we won the swimming gala at Whitchurch.Lots of things happen at our small school.
